title: Danger level
creator_credit: Warren J Mills, Ansvar Insurance and Christopher Productions
brief_description: Tests of the effects of alcohol consumption on driving performance carried out by the Univeristy of New South Wales at the Warwick Farm Motor Racing Circuit. Volunteers including leading professional drivers undertake tests of skill after dosage to various blood alcohol levels, showing how ability is impaired.
